content: i am so excited to finally share this pattern with you all it is a quick little stranded neckwarmer worked up in a wool worsted weight yarn it is knit in the round and features a simple stranded design that is easy to memorize and good for those new to colorwork the colorwork pattern is given in written instructions as well as in a chart for those of you that are more visually inclined yarn used lark by quince and co or another worsted weight yarn 135 yards 50g main color mc egret white 50 yards 20g contrasting color #1 cc1 honey green 50 yards 20g contrasting color #2 cc2 chanterelle brown
